root.name: String Formatting

example.code:
age = 7 animal = 'turtle' weight = 317.5
# Format string to include animal, age, and weight to one digit after the decimal point. s = ("This %s is %i years old, and weighs %.1f pounds." % (animal, age, weight)) print(s)

root.description: Substitute variables in a string using the string format operator % as shown above. Symbols that can be used with % include: %i for integers, %f for floats and %s for strings.
